sailpoint.object

Class ScoreDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.SailPointObject
        • sailpoint.object.ScoreDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject, sailpoint.tools.xml.XMLReferenceTarget

    public class ScoreDefinition
extends SailPointObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The definition of one scoring algorithm. These were designed a SailPointObject subclasses, but they are only stored as XML within the ScoreConfig.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ARG_COMPENSATED
      The name of a standard score definition argument that when true indicates that the Scorer is to calculate a compensated score rather than a raw score.
      static int DEFAULT_RANGE
      The default range if unspecified.

      • setParent

        public void setParent(java.lang.String s)
        Name of the parent definition. This is used in cases where a "baseline" score and a "compensated" score are calculated, but all of the same configuration from the baseline score definition is needed in the compensated score definition.

      • getParent

        public java.lang.String getParent()

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Description copied from class: SailPointObject
        Return the object description. Descriptions are generally longer than the name and are intended for display in a multi-line text area.
        Overrides:
        getDescription in class SailPointObject

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String d)
        Overrides:
        setDescription in class SailPointObject

      • getRange

        public int getRange()
        The upper bound of the score produced by this scorer. The lower bound is assumed to be zero.

      • setRange

        public void setRange(int i)

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight()
        The weight this score has relative to its peers. This is encoded as an integer from 0 to 100 representing the percentage of the composite score this score contributes.

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(int i)

      • getConfigPage

        public java.lang.String getConfigPage()
        Name URL of the page where containing the configuration panel for this score. Example: businessRoleScoringInclude.jsf

      • getDisplayableName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayableName()
        Returns the name depending on which name fields are populated in this order of preference: displayName, shortName, name. Note that this can be a message catalog key.

      • getScore

        public static ScoreDefinition getScore(java.util.List<ScoreDefinition> scores,
                                       java.lang.String name)
        Utility to look for a score on a list. Necessary when you want to search one of the score definitions in ScoreConfig without knowing which one you have.
